name: Meta Generator AI
author: SJ innovation

sections.description:
This Plugin is a useful way to automatically generate meta data for products based on the product name, which can save time and effort when creating large numbers of products.

How to Generate OpenAI API Key

You can generate the API key from the Open AI Platform: https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Go to the Plugins page and activate the plugin.
  3. Use the Meta Generator Settings menu link to configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
What does this plugin do?

Meta Generator AI uses Open AI to generate meta data for products based on the product name.

What are the key features of this plugin?

As of version 1.0, this plugin generates product tags for your woocommerce products.
There are 2 main features of this plugin:
1. Generate Meta Data.
2. Enter Custom Description.

Generate Meta Data: This feature uses Open AI to generate product tags for products based on the product name.
Enter Custom Description: This feature allows you to enter a custom description for your product and based on the description provided the plugin generates a suitable product title and product tags.

short_description: Effortless metadata creation for your products with the Meta Generator AI WordPress Plugin!
